location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Camp Jeypore [Jaipur] to Charles Umpherston Aitchison

mods.abstract: Letter regarding the Maharana's [Maharana Shambhu Singh] death and lack of an apparent successor; his thoughts on Suckut Sing [Sakat Singh], and on the Maharana and other's reference for Suckut Sing's son Sinain Sing [Sajjan Singh] (also spelt as Singain Sing) as successor.The letter also informs Aitchison that the Viceroy's enquiries after the Maharana's health were communicated; discusses potential troop movements should trouble arise following the Maharana's death and on concerns over Sinain Sing and the lack of any preferable successor.
